scenario_text.value:
This woman is totally suspicious! Don’t you
trust her!
Hmm... How can I clear things up for you?

Look, Kaito, if you don’t trust her, what’s
the alternative? Could you lay it out for us?

What?! Don’t give me that! If you screw with
me, I will mess you up!
See, this is the problem with you, Kaito.

You refuse to budge, and just harass people
until you get your way.

Urgh...I don’t want to hear this! This isn’t
about my problems, okay?!

You want to get to the tower, right? I’ll
take you there. No need to get so worked up.

I’ll do whatever I can to clear up any
misunderstandings.
